# UX Evidence & Artifacts

Capture visual requirements and research to guide the frontend implementation.

## 1. Wireframes / Mockups
Paste or link to Figma/screenshots here.

## 2. User Flows
Describe the step-by-step user journey.

1. User logs in.
2. Navigates to [Page Name].
3. Clicks [Button].
4. Sees [Modal].

## 3. Existing UI References
Screenshots of existing screens we are modifying or mimicking.

## 4. Accessibility Requirements
- Keyboard navigation order
- Screen reader labels
- Color contrast checks
